name: TDC Dreamer Certificates
description:
Dreamer Certificates are the first component of The Dream Conduit DAO, and are earned by participation in Conduit Rooms which educate on NFTs and Web3.
Recipients of Dreamer Certificates are formally recognized as Dreamers and are given governance potential.
Dreamer Certificates are crucial to the permanent decentralization of the DAO. No vote in the DAO can exist without a Certificate to validate it.
We offer our services at no cost, and we offer our NFTâ€™s the same way. Certificates are airdropped, no minting fees necessary.
Participate and earn your say in The Dream Conduit, the first 501(c)3 non-profit, carbon-neutral DAO.
